file.name: missingPathParam2.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Test invalid missing path parameter 2
  version: 1.0.0

paths:
  '/test/{test}/{test2}':
    get:
      parameters:
      - name: test
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      operationId: same
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK

Error: parse: paths: /test/{test}/{test2}: get: operation "same": parse path: path parameter not specified: "test2"
